abstract.text: Come with us as we delve into unsafe pointer types in Swift. Discover the requirements for each type and how to use it correctly. We‚Äôll discuss typed pointers, drop down to raw pointers, and finally circumvent pointer type safety entirely by binding memory.
Session notes shared by the community for the community.

What exactly makes code ‚Äúunsafe‚Äù? Join the Swift team as we take a look at the programming language‚Äôs safety precautions ‚Äî and when you might need to reach for unsafe operations. We‚Äôll take a look at APIs that can cause unexpected states if not used correctly, and how you can write code more specifically to avoid undefined behavior. Learn how to work with C APIs that use pointers and the steps to take when you want to use Swift‚Äôs unsafe pointer APIs.
